bill.title: Requesting The Director Of Labor And Industrial Relations To Convene A Task Force To Study, Design, And Develop A Paid Family Leave Pilot Program.
bill.description: Requesting The Director Of Labor And Industrial Relations To Convene A Task Force To Study, Design, And Develop A Paid Family Leave Pilot Program.

history.action: To be offered.
Offered
Referred to LAT, FIN, referral sheet 25
Resolution scheduled to be heard by LAT on Thursday, 03-18-21 9:00AM in conference room 312 Via Videoconference.

The committees on LAT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Onishi, Sayama, Belatti, Holt, D. Kobayashi, Takayama, Okimoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Quinlan.
Reported from LAT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1135) as amended in HD 1, recommending referral to FIN.

Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 1 with Representative(s) Kapela voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) LoPresti voting no (1) and Representative(s) McDermott excused (1).
Scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 03-30-21 11:00AM in conference room 309 Via Videoconference.
Re-scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 03-30-21 11:00AM in conference room 308 Via Videoconference.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Branco, Eli, Holt, Ilagan, B. Kobayashi, Marten, Nishimoto, Perruso, Sayama, Tam, Wildberger; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Yamashita, McDermott.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1546), recommending adoption.
Adopted with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Kapela, LoPresti, Perruso voting no (3) and Representative(s) Gates, Ohno excused (2).
Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 364).
Referred to LCA, WAM.
The committee(s) on LCA has scheduled a public hearing on 04-09-21 3:00PM; CR 225 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on LCA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in LCA were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Ihara, Chang; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Keohokalole, Fevella.
Reported from LCA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1720), as amended (SD 1), with recommendation of referral to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 04-15-21 10:00AM; CR 211 & Videoconference.
Report adopted, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, English, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Moriwaki, Shimabukuro, Taniguchi, Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1776) with recommendation of adoption.
Report and Resolution Adopted. Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 830) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 626).

votes.desc: House Labor & Tourism: Passed, With Amendments
Senate Labor, Culture and the Arts: Passed, With Amendments
Senate Ways and Means: Passed, Unamended
